summary: A rich momma's boy returns west with the son of his murdered father's partner to foil a gang trying to gain control of his family ranch.
cast: Dean Martin|Jerry Lewis|Lori Nelson|Jeff Morrow|Jackie Loughery|John Baragrey|Agnes Moorehead|Lon Chaney Jr.|Milton Frome|Richard Aherne|Lee Van Cleef|Stuart Randall|Scott Douglas|Jack Elam|Bob Steele|Mickey Finn|Douglas Spencer|Philip Tonge|Dorothy Abbott|Eric Alden|Valerie Allen|Frank Baker|Bill Baldwin|Bobby Barber|Emily Belser|Stanley Blystone|Robert Brubaker|Nora Bush|Noble 'Kid' Chissell|Ben Corbett|Frank Cordell|Highland Dale|Jimmy Dime|Duke Fishman|Dorothy Ford|William Forrest|Robert Garvey|James Gonzalez|Gavin Gordon|Joe Gray|Signe Hack|Chick Hannan|Len Hendry|Don House|George Huggins|Michael Jeffers|Ann Kunde|Ethan Laidlaw|Hank Mann|Ann McCrea|Frances Mercer|Tony Michael|Matt Moore|Mary Newton|Emory Parnell|James Parnell|Ford Raymond|Elaine Riley|Robert Robinson|Charles Stevens|Jack Tornek|Johnstone White|Keith Wilson
title: Juntos ante el peligro
